dict.acceptation: 听力，听觉；审问；听力所及的距离，听得见的范围；听证会，〈美〉意见听取会；
听到，听见( hear的现在分词)；

sent.orig: We provides Hearing Service, Hearing Aid Service, Hearing Aid Fitting Aid Maintenance and Professional Advices.
sent.trans: 耳灵听力中心-提供听力测验、助听器验配、耳模塑造及助听器维修、及专业建议。

sent.orig: The hearers of a maritime administrative agency include the presiding hearer, hearing officers, and hearing clerks.
sent.trans: 海事管理机构的听证人员包括听证主持人、听证员和书记员。

sent.orig: My implants don't aid my hearing. They create my hearing.
sent.trans: 这些移植物并不是帮助我形成听觉。事实上，他们创造了我的听觉。

sent.orig: A hearing aid helps to overcome defects in hearing.
sent.trans: 助听器有助于克服听觉缺陷。

sent.orig: Having a hearing loss, wearing a hearing aid, is not the same as wearing eye glasses.
sent.trans: 戴助听器的听障和戴眼镜的近视不一样。
